Greetings one and all. I have been unable to get online for the past few 
days. I have read the posts and caught up, but am unable to post until 
Monday. I will not post tomorrow in observance of the departing of our 
fellow role player. I am sorry that he died. I didn't know him very well, 
but he was a good role player and a courteous person. I am glad that he is 
at peace.

        -->Pleasent dreams,
                --->Tavatron/Rion/Hysteria

"It's something unpredictable, but in the end is right. I hope you had the 
time of you life..."
          ------->Time of you're life; Nimrod Greenday

"Step back from that ledge my friend, and I will understand... I will 
understand..."
          ------->Stephen Jenkin's; Third Eye Blind; Jumper
